name: Death Remains Post Ludum Dare
description:
Post Ludum Dare 42 version

Controls:

  • WASD To move
  • Left mouse button to shoot

Description

  • Play as an archer shooting skeleton archers More and more skeletons spawn Skeletons never die they get knocked out jump them in the pits by shooting them or pushing them to get rid of them Skeleton arrows shoot through other skeletons, yours cannot
  • Skeletons should be dumped in the pits for 5 score and killed for 1 score Fire rate and health pickups spawn periodically in random locations
  • Try to gain a high score

Issues

  • Full screen web version cuts off some screen
  • Some resolutions Don't work too well

Mobile version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Company.DuckyDaniel

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/death-remains
